description:
This is a cozy studio apartment in the upper east side. Great for business travelers, couples, or solos.

Private apartment.

I will be traveling during this time but I will have a neighbor with keys, and can help assist with any questions.

The apartment is in walking distance to wonderful restaurants and bars on 2nd Ave. Personal favorites: The Milton, Wine Bar, and DTUT.
Wash and fold laundry matt next door.

Transportation near by:  Q train 6 train, Same block as the crosstown 86, downtown31, wash and fold next door, and central park. .

Wifi, Roku TV set up with netflix, 
Bedding, and towels will all be provided. (personal items in pictures will be removed)
name: Studio Apartment Upper East Side
